info.title: Voucherify API
info.description: Voucherify promotion engine REST API. Please see https://docs.voucherify.io/docs for more details.

post.description:
Activate manually the pending points and add them to the loyalty card. The pending points are determined by the pending point ID.

Once activated, the pending point entry with that ID is not listed by the endpoints: List member ([with campaign ID](ref:list-member-pending-points-1), [without campaign ID](ref:list-member-pending-points)), [List campaign pending points](ref:list-campaign-pending-points).

This **POST** method does not require a request body.

>ðŸ‘ Configuring pending points
>
>Pending points are configured as part of an earning rule with [POST Create earning rule](ref:create-earning-rule) or [PUT Update earning rule](ref:update-earning-rule).

200.description: Returns details about the activated pending points, the current point balance, and loyalty card in general.

400.description: Returns an error if the pending points have been already activated or canceled.

value.details: Only pending points in 'PENDING' status can be activated. Current status: 'ACTIVATED'.
Only pending points in 'PENDING' status can be activated. Current status: 'CANCELED'.

404.description: Returns an error if the member or pending point ID could not be found.

value.details: Cannot find voucher with id NoSuchMemberId
Cannot find pending_points with id lopp_0ffc655c85207fe9b

LoyaltiesMembersPendingPointsActivateRes.title: Loyalties Members Pending Points Activate Response Body

points.description: The number of pending points added to the loyalty card.

total.description: Total number of points incurred over the lifespan of the loyalty card, minus the expired points.

balance.description: The current number of loyalty points after the pending points have been added.

type.description: The type of the voucher being modified. For pending points, it is always `loyalty_card`.

object.description: The type of the object represented by JSON. Default is `balance`.

related_object.description: Defines the resource that is being modified.

id.description: Identifies the voucher that is being modified. This is the unique identifer that was assigned by Voucherify.

operation_type.description: The type of the operation being performed.

key.description: Short string describing the kind of error which occurred.

message.description: A human-readable message providing a short description of the error.

details.description: A human-readable message providing more details about the error.

request_id.description: This ID is useful when troubleshooting and/or finding the root cause of an error response by our support team.

resource_id.description: Unique resource ID that can be used in another endpoint to get more details.

error.description: Includes additional information about the error.

message.description: The message configured by the user in a validation rule.
